content.name: com.microchip.mcu32.mplabx.project.net_apps_pic32mz_wolfssl_tcp_server_pic32mz_ef_sk
content.displayName: TCP/IP WolfSSL TCP Server Example for PIC32MZ EF Family
content.shortDescription: This configuration demonstrates creating a simple Internet Web server, that operates with clear text (TCP Port 80), and with encrypted text (TCP Port 443). If IPv6 is enabled than the demonstration also serves both types of connections on IPv6. The Web server only serves one page with the text 'Nothing Here' to all Web clients.
content.author: Microchip
subcategories: PIC32MZ Embedded Connectivity with FPU (EF) Starter Kit
